column5: This apartment I very private. You have exclusive rights to the floor. Noone else in the building can get to the 9th floor except ppl on the 9th floor. There is private underground parking for 1 car. There are several pools on the property as well as sand volleyball and kickball. There is an onsite gym. It is truly like living on a resort. We welcome any and all people, a very diversified culture. Any maintenance issues relate to me and I will contact he service team.
